thread.title: Presidential candidate Clinton says removing Assad in Syria is No. 1 priority
thread.title_full: Presidential candidate Clinton says removing Assad in Syria is No. 1 priority | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Presidential candidate Clinton says removing Assad in Syria is No. 1 priority
text:
HOLLIS, N.H. U.S. Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton on Monday said removing President Bashar al-Assad is the top priority in Syria.
Clinton, speaking at a town hall meeting in Hollis, said the United States should pursue a diplomatic solution in resolving Syria's internal conflict.
(Reporting by Amanda Becker ; Writing by Bill Trott ; Editing by Chizu Nomiyama )
